column1: Thank you @realDonaldTrump for supporting our #TN6 students in Smith County. We stand with each of you in your fight for prayer in schools.  https://t.co/rYDc5NRKb3

Jim had a successful law career but will be most remembered for the great friendship he offered so many. His presence in Gallatin will be greatly missed.

The hardworking men and women of #TN6 are already burdened with too many taxes. Yet they balance their checkbooks and live within their means. The answer is not more taxes -- it’s responsible government. #DemDebate
Democrats continue to infringe on our rights as Americans but I will not stand for it. We cannot back down on our #2A rights.

The abortion rhetoric in the #DemDebate is no different than what we’ve heard from Washington D.C. New York & Virginia & it is absolutely heartbreaking. Democrats can waste time debating the qualifications for “life” but in #TN6 we know that all babies are a gift from God.
